verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <WH3050> ye the LORD אוֹדֶ֣ה <WH3034> I will praise יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> the LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לֵבָ֑ב <WH3824> with [my] whole heart בְּס֖וֹד <WH5475> in the assembly יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> of the upright וְעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> and [in] the congregation
גְּ֭דֹלִים <WH1419> [are] great מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> The works יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD דְּ֝רוּשִׁ֗ים <WH1875> sought out לְכָל־ <WH3605> all חֶפְצֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH2656> of all them that have pleasure
הוֹד־ <WH1935> [is] honourable וְהָדָ֥ר <WH1926> and glorious פָּֽעֳל֑וֹ <WH6467> His work וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <WH6666> and his righteousness עֹמֶ֥דֶת <WH5975> endureth לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> for ever

זֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> to be remembered עָ֭שָׂה <WH6213> He hath made לְנִפְלְאֹתָ֑יו <WH6381> his wonderful works חַנּ֖וּן <WH2587> [is] gracious וְרַח֣וּם <WH7349> and full of compassion יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
טֶ֭רֶף <WH2964> meat נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> He hath given לִֽירֵאָ֑יו <WH3373> unto them that fear יִזְכֹּ֖ר <WH2142> be mindful לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> him he will ever בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1285> of his covenant

כֹּ֣חַ <WH3581> the power מַ֭עֲשָׂיו <WH4639> of his works הִגִּ֣יד <WH5046> He hath shewed לְעַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> his people לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> that he may give לָ֝הֶ֗ם נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> them the heritage גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of the heathen

מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> The works יָ֭דָיו <WH3027> of his hands אֱמֶ֣ת <WH571> [are] verity וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> and judgment נֶ֝אֱמָנִ֗ים <WH539> [are] sure כָּל־ <WH3605> All פִּקּוּדָֽיו׃ <WH6490> all his commandments
סְמוּכִ֣ים <WH5564> They stand fast לָעַ֣ד <WH5703> for ever לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> and ever עֲ֝שׂוּיִ֗ם <WH6213> [and are] done בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת <WH571> in truth וְיָשָֽׁר׃ <WH3477> and uprightness

פְּד֤וּת ׀ <WH6304> redemption שָׁ֘לַ֤ח <WH7971> He sent לְעַמּ֗וֹ <WH5971> unto his people צִוָּֽה־ <WH6680> he hath commanded לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever בְּרִית֑וֹ <WH1285> his covenant קָד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> holy וְנוֹרָ֣א <WH3372> and reverend שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> [is] his name

רֵ֘אשִׁ֤ית <WH7225> [is] the beginning חָכְמָ֨ה ׀ <WH2451> of wisdom יִרְאַ֬ת <WH3374> The fear יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD שֵׂ֣כֶל <WH7922> understanding ט֭וֹב <WH2896> a good לְכָל־ <WH3605> have all עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <WH6213> have all they that do תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ <WH8416> [his commandments] his praise עֹמֶ֥דֶת <WH5975> endureth לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> for ever
